title: My camera range in-game looks smaller?
body:
So recently I upgraded computers, from an old outdated pc with a 1366 x 766 monitor or something along those lines. My new pc has a 1920 x 1080 resolution monitor, it's an all in one pc so I cannot change this. I tried it out in a custom game earlier and it seems like the screen is smaller. I can't see as far as I used to be able to. Can anyone help? 

My in-game resolution is set to 1920 x 1080. 

The camera seems too zoomed in? I've tried scrolling out but it won't go any further.

replies.body: In case you switched to a 4K, keep in mind that it's not a setup we currently support.  Your resolution may also be too high so your game screen can look wonky- especially if you tab out.  I recommend reducing your resolutions in-game and screen to fix things up, or swapping screens.  You can also hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you still have any issues.  Hope that helps!
